short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Condensed map rotation information for Splatoon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's basically just splatoon.ink in a box. All credit to its original creator.
